verses.verse: Now those that sealed<WH2856> <WH5921> were, Nehemiah,<WH5166> the Tirshatha,<WH8660> the son<WH1121> of Hachaliah,<WH2446> and Zidkijah,<WH6667>
Maaziah, <WH4590> Bilgai,<WH1084> Shemaiah:<WH8098> these<WH428> were the priests.<WH3548>
And the Levites:<WH3881> both Jeshua<WH3442> the son<WH1121> of Azaniah,<WH245> Binnui<WH1131> of the sons<WH4480> <WH1121> of Henadad,<WH2582> Kadmiel;<WH6934>
And their brethren,<WH251> Shebaniah,<WH7645> Hodijah,<WH1941> Kelita,<WH7042> Pelaiah,<WH6411> Hanan,<WH2605>
The chief<WH7218> of the people;<WH5971> Parosh,<WH6551> Pahath-moab,<WH6355> Elam,<WH5867> Zatthu,<WH2240> Bani,<WH1137>

And the rest<WH7605> of the people,<WH5971> the priests,<WH3548> the Levites,<WH3881> the porters,<WH7778> the singers,<WH7891> the Nethinims,<WH5411> and all<WH3605> they that had separated themselves<WH914> from the people<WH4480> <WH5971> of the lands<WH776> unto<WH413> the law<WH8451> of God,<WH430> their wives,<WH802> their sons,<WH1121> and their daughters,<WH1323> every<WH3605> one having knowledge,<WH3045> and having understanding;<WH995>

They cleaved<WH2388> to<WH5921> their brethren,<WH251> their nobles,<WH117> and entered<WH935> into a curse,<WH423> and into an oath,<WH7621> to walk<WH1980> in God's<WH430> law,<WH8451> which<WH834> was given<WH5414> by<WH3027> Moses<WH4872> the servant<WH5650> of God,<WH430> and to observe<WH8104> and do<WH6213> <WH853> all<WH3605> the commandments<WH4687> of the LORD<WH3068> our Lord,<WH113> and his judgments<WH4941> and his statutes;<WH2706>
And that<WH834> we would not<WH3808> give<WH5414> our daughters<WH1323> unto the people<WH5971> of the land,<WH776> nor<WH3808> take<WH3947> their daughters<WH1323> for our sons: <WH1121>

And if the people<WH5971> of the land<WH776> bring<WH935> <WH853> ware<WH4728> or any<WH3605> victuals<WH7668> on the sabbath<WH7676> day<WH3117> to sell,<WH4376> that we would not<WH3808> buy<WH3947> it of<WH4480> them on the sabbath,<WH7676> or on the holy<WH6944> day:<WH3117> and that we would leave<WH5203> <WH853> the seventh<WH7637> year,<WH8141> and the exaction<WH4855> of every<WH3605> debt.<WH3027>

Also we made<WH5975> ordinances<WH4687> for<WH5921> us, to charge<WH5414> ourselves<WH5921> yearly<WH8141> with the third part<WH7992> of a shekel<WH8255> for the service<WH5656> of the house<WH1004> of our God;<WH430>

For the shewbread,<WH3899> <WH4635> and for the continual<WH8548> meat offering,<WH4503> and for the continual<WH8548> burnt offering,<WH5930> of the sabbaths,<WH7676> of the new moons,<WH2320> for the set feasts,<WH4150> and for the holy<WH6944> things, and for the sin offerings<WH2403> to make an atonement<WH3722> for<WH5921> Israel,<WH3478> and for all<WH3605> the work<WH4399> of the house<WH1004> of our God.<WH430>

And we cast the lots among<WH5307> <WH1486> the priests,<WH3548> the Levites,<WH3881> and the people,<WH5971> for<WH5921> the wood<WH6086> offering,<WH7133> to bring<WH935> it into the house<WH1004> of our God,<WH430> after the houses<WH1004> of our fathers,<WH1> at times<WH6256> appointed<WH2163> year<WH8141> by year,<WH8141> to burn<WH1197> upon<WH5921> the altar<WH4196> of the LORD<WH3068> our God,<WH430> as it is written<WH3789> in the law: <WH8451>

And to bring<WH935> <WH853> the firstfruits<WH1061> of our ground,<WH127> and the firstfruits<WH1061> of all<WH3605> fruit<WH6529> of all<WH3605> trees,<WH6086> year<WH8141> by year,<WH8141> unto the house<WH1004> of the LORD: <WH3068>

Also the firstborn<WH1060> of our sons,<WH1121> and of our cattle,<WH929> as it is written<WH3789> in the law,<WH8451> and the firstlings<WH1062> of our herds<WH1241> and of our flocks,<WH6629> to bring<WH935> to the house<WH1004> of our God,<WH430> unto the priests<WH3548> that minister<WH8334> in the house<WH1004> of our God: <WH430>

And that we should bring<WH935> the firstfruits<WH7225> of our dough,<WH6182> and our offerings,<WH8641> and the fruit<WH6529> of all<WH3605> manner of trees,<WH6086> of wine<WH8492> and of oil,<WH3323> unto the priests,<WH3548> to<WH413> the chambers<WH3957> of the house<WH1004> of our God;<WH430> and the tithes<WH4643> of our ground<WH127> unto the Levites,<WH3881> that the same<WH1992> Levites<WH3881> might have the tithes<WH6237> in all<WH3605> the cities<WH5892> of our tillage.<WH5656>

And the priest<WH3548> the son<WH1121> of Aaron<WH175> shall be<WH1961> with<WH5973> the Levites,<WH3881> when the Levites<WH3881> take tithes:<WH6237> and the Levites<WH3881> shall bring up<WH5927> <WH853> the tithe<WH4643> of the tithes<WH4643> unto the house<WH1004> of our God,<WH430> to<WH413> the chambers,<WH3957> into the treasure<WH214> house.<WH1004>

For <WH3588> the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> and the children<WH1121> of Levi<WH3878> shall bring<WH935> <WH853> the offering<WH8641> of the corn,<WH1715> of the new wine,<WH8492> and the oil,<WH3323> unto<WH413> the chambers,<WH3957> where<WH8033> are the vessels<WH3627> of the sanctuary,<WH4720> and the priests<WH3548> that minister,<WH8334> and the porters,<WH7778> and the singers:<WH7891> and we will not<WH3808> forsake<WH5800> <WH853> the house<WH1004> of our God.<WH430>
